author: Markus Per√∂bner <markus.peroebner@gmail.com>
name: osm-read
description: an openstreetmap XML and PBF data parser

scripts.buildProto: node_modules/protobufjs/bin/proto2js lib/proto/fileformat.proto -commonjs > lib/proto/fileformat.js && node_modules/protobufjs/bin/proto2js lib/proto/osmformat.proto -commonjs > lib/proto/osmformat.js
